verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>, for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. As the hart <WH354> panteth <WH6165> <WH8799> after the water <WH4325> brooks <WH650>, so panteth <WH6165> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315> after thee, O 'Elohim <WH430>.

My soul <WH5315> thirsteth <WH6770> <WH8804> for 'Elohim <WH430>, for the living <WH2416> 'Elohim <WH410>: when shall I come <WH935> <WH8799> and appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430> ?
My tears <WH1832> have been my meat <WH3899> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, while they continually <WH3117> say <WH559> <WH8800> unto me, Where is thy 'Elohim <WH430> ?

When I remember <WH2142> <WH8799> these things, I pour out <WH8210> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315> in me: for I had gone <WH5674> <WH8799> with the multitude <WH5519>, I went <WH1718> <WH8691> with them to the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>, with the voice <WH6963> of joy <WH7440> and praise <WH8426>, with a multitude <WH1995> that kept holyday <WH2287> <WH8802>.

Why art thou cast down <WH7817> <WH8709>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why art thou disquieted <WH1993> <WH8799> in me? hope <WH3176> <WH8685> thou in 'Elohim <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> <WH8686> him for the help <WH3444> of his countenance <WH6440>.

O my 'Elohim <WH430>, my soul <WH5315> is cast down <WH7817> <WH8709> within me: therefore will I remember <WH2142> <WH8799> thee from the land <WH776> of Yarden <WH3383>, and of the Hermonites <WH2769>, from the hill <WH2022> Mizar <WH4706>.
Deep <WH8415> calleth <WH7121> <WH8802> unto deep <WH8415> at the noise <WH6963> of thy waterspouts <WH6794>: all thy waves <WH4867> and thy billows <WH1530> are gone <WH5674> <WH8804> over me.

Yet the YY <WH3068> will command <WH6680> <WH8762> his lovingkindness <WH2617> in the daytime <WH3119>, and in the night <WH3915> his song <WH7892> shall be with me, and my prayer <WH8605> unto the 'Elohim <WH410> of my life <WH2416>.

I will say <WH559> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH410> my rock <WH5553>, Why hast thou forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> me? why go <WH3212> <WH8799> I mourning <WH6937> <WH8802> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> ?
As with a sword <WH7524> in my bones <WH6106>, mine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802> reproach <WH2778> <WH8765> me; while they say <WH559> <WH8800> daily <WH3117> unto me, Where is thy 'Elohim <WH430> ?

Why art thou cast down <WH7817> <WH8709>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why art thou disquieted <WH1993> <WH8799> within me? hope <WH3176> <WH8685> thou in 'Elohim <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> <WH8686> him, who is the health <WH3444> of my countenance <WH6440>, and my 'Elohim <WH430>.
